game.name: zzzzz
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Who's behind this? zzzzz is a hardcore platformer where you have to overcome a series of challenging levels in order to find the answers you're looking for.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Who's behind this? zzzzz is a hardcore platformer where you have to overcome a series of challenging levels in order to find the answers you're looking for.

reviewHighlights.text: You wanna have a difficult platforming game? Fine. You want to kick the user back a level each time they die, forcing a perfect run to even complete i...
